name: OCKOutcomeStoreDelegate
desc: An object that receives change callbacks from outcome stores.

items.name: func outcomeStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyOutcomeStore, didAddOutcomes: [OCKAnyOutcome])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you add outcomes to the store.

items.name: func outcomeStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyOutcomeStore, didUpdateOutcomes: [OCKAnyOutcome])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you update outcomes in the store.

items.name: func outcomeStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyOutcomeStore, didDeleteOutcomes: [OCKAnyOutcome])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you delete outcomes from the store.
